document_data.caption: A map showing the Wall of Coins (labeled #1) in central Suldolphor.
document_data.name: Wall of Coins
document_data.mainbody: The '''Wall of Coins''' was a temple devoted to [[Waukeen]], the Coinmaiden, located in [[Suldolphor]] in far eastern [[Calimshan]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The temple was located in central Suldolphor near [[Emerald Dragon Way]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Suldolphor}}
document_data.Description: Since Waukeen's silence following the [[Time of Troubles]] in [[1358 DR]], the Wall of Coins was practically abandoned, filling with dust and darkness. A famed floating altar made from pure [[gold]] lay within the temple.
document_data.Inhabitants: The temple lacked a [[high priest]] ''circa'' {{Yearlink|1367}}. Members of the [[Flame Guard]] protected the temple.
document_data.Defenses: Anyone attempting to steal or disturb the floating altar would be struck by ''[[chain lightning]]''.
